description: Warsaw is pushing the EU to take action against Belarus after it cracked down on the opposition.
title: Belarus protests: Why Poland is backing the opposition
title_page: Belarus protests: Why Poland is backing the opposition - BBC News
maintext: "Belarusians have not only broken through their own fear, but they have shown the whole of Europe that they want to belong to a Europe of free, democratic, nations under the rule of law," he told Polish Radio on Wednesday.
